type.description: A string that uniquely identifies this Event Type.

schema_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the Schema this Event Type adheres to.

date_created.description: The date that this Event Type was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Event Type was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

description.description: A human readable description for this Event Type.

id.description: The unique identifier of the schema. Each schema can have multiple versions, that share the same id.

links.description: Contains a dictionary of URL links to nested resources of this schema.

latest_version_date_created.description: The date that the latest schema version was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

latest_version.description: The latest version published of this schema.

id.description: The unique identifier of the schema. Each schema can have multiple versions, that share the same id.

date_created.description: The date the schema version was created, given in ISO 8601 format.
The date that this Sink was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Sink was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

description.description: A human readable description for the Sink

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Sink.

sink_configuration.description: The information required for Twilio to connect to the provided Sink encoded as JSON.

sink_type.description: The Sink type. Can only be "kinesis" or "webhook" currently.

status.description: The Status of this Sink. One of `initialized`, `validating`, `active` or `failed`.

links.description: Contains a dictionary of URL links to nested resources of this Sink.

result.description: Feedback indicating whether the test event was generated.
Feedback indicating whether the given Sink was validated.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account.

type.description: Type of event being subscribed to.

schema_version.description: The schema version that the Subscription should use.

subscription_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Subscription.

account_sid.description: The unique SID identifier of the Account.

sid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Subscription.

date_created.description: The date that this Subscription was created, given in ISO 8601 format.

date_updated.description: The date that this Subscription was updated, given in ISO 8601 format.

description.description: A human readable description for the Subscription

sink_sid.description: The SID of the sink that events selected by this subscription should be sent to. Sink must be active for the subscription to be created.

links.description: Contains a dictionary of URL links to nested resources of this Subscription.

info.title: Twilio - Events
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all the available Event Types.

parameters.name: SchemaId
parameters.description: A string parameter filtering the results to return only the Event Types using a given schema.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: A string that uniquely identifies this Event Type.

/v1/Schemas/{Id}.description: Versioned Schema definitions for Event Types

get.description: Fetch a specific schema with its nested versions.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the schema. Each schema can have multiple versions, that share the same id.

/v1/Schemas.description: Versioned Schema definitions for Event Types

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the schema. Each schema can have multiple versions, that share the same id.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the schema. Each schema can have multiple versions, that share the same id.

parameters.name: SchemaVersion
parameters.description: The version of the schema

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of Sinks belonging to the account used to make the request.

parameters.name: InUse
parameters.description: A boolean query parameter filtering the results to return sinks used/not used by a subscription.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: A String query parameter filtering the results by status `initialized`, `validating`, `active` or `failed`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

post.description: Create a new Sink Test Event for the given Sink.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the Sink to be Tested.

post.description: Validate that a test event for a Sink was received.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the Sink being validated.

TestId.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the test event for a Sink being validated.
